summary: This file contains FBI and CIA documents related to Joseph R. Merola and his involvement in Caribbean political activities, particularly concerning Cuba and Panama, during the late 1950s and 1970s. The documents include reports, memos, and correspondence detailing Merola's contacts with the CIA, his alleged ties to anti-Castro groups, and his role as a source of foreign intelligence.
title: Joseph R. Merola File
origin_agency: FBI, CIA, Department of Army, Department of Justice
recipient: David M. Curry, John K. Greaney
sender: Maurice A. Sovern, John K. Greaney, Crocky Br
